website_summaries.verdict: For a more unique retro style, consider these Zebra Wood clubmaster sunglasses.
pros: lenses measure 2 inches wide by 2 inches tall
Includes carrying case, lens cleaning cloth, and wood guitar pick
cons: Some find the lenses a little thin

customer_reviews.title: Broken on 2nd wear
customer_reviews.text: My Woodies sunglasses fit perfectly. They looked great. Lightweight so they stayed on my face well. After less than one month, my sunglasses broke at the hinge. It was literally my first day of vacation -- the reason why I purchased these sunglasses. I carried them in my case so they were smashed in route. I literally unfolded them and they broke. $25 is overpriced for 2 opportunities to wear a pair of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for women
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I have a small frame & they fit perfectly. They are dark enough when in direct sunlight. The quailty of the product is well worth the price. Definitely recommend for women or men with a smaller frame. My husband has a huge football head & they looked like kids glasses on him. The colors are dead on with the photo listed. These feel like a $100 pair of sunglasses instead ofn $25.
customer_reviews.author: nicolelove311

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these and they are great quality for the price. Wanted something different from my usual wayfarers - only thing 2 things I don’t “love” - the nose pads catch on my hair and pull, and they are too dark for days that are partly cloudy - I usually choose a different pair except on full sun days.
customer_reviews.author: Lady.k

customer_reviews.title: Taking some of the sting out of a loss
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. I lost my favorite classic Ray-Bans I've had for years I bought with my wife. Losing those sunglasses almost felt like losing my wedding band. It says it all that I replaced the Ray-Bans with these after earlier experiencing the set of Woodies I bought to keep in my wife's car. Woodies are the only sunglasses I've worn that my 20-something son has remarked looked cool. I'm thinking about buying a pair for him for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I understand they are only $25 sunglasses but I have bought other glasses for a similar cost that are much sturdier and better made.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made product. Extremely flimsy. I received the glasses and kept them in the included case, they sat in the center console of my car that had nothing else in it and I went to wear them and the temple was separated from the lens. I understand they are only $25 sunglasses but I have bought other glasses for a similar cost that are much sturdier and better made.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Gerwel

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 days...
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair for my girlfriend as a gift. She thought they were super stylish and cute and they came with a nice case, wrist band, guitar pick, and sticker. But I'm not reviewing all the extras. The arm snapped off these glasses as she was putting them on her face the SECOND DAY she wore them. Come on...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor hinges; stylish
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a second pair. First broke after just a few weeks. The hinges don't have any outward flex. I was surprised by this, since all other glasses and sunglasses that I have ever bought have hinges (I think with springs?) that enable the arms to bend outward past perpendicular to the frame. This is important for taking them off and putting them on. You have to precisely put them on and take them off from dead-center on your face, so as not to force the arms into an obtuse angle, as they'll snap right off. This is the only weak point in the construction, but the product would be much better if the hinges were improved
customer_reviews.author: amazn_customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Look, Poor Lenses
customer_reviews.text: I have already reviewed this once and said they look exactly as shown and are as light as you would possibly want. The only problem was the quality of the lens is low grade. It blocks not only bright light but reduces vision considerably. I would easily pay $50+ more for these exact glasses with a high quality lens. It's a shame that they are price pointed so low that this would be an impossibility at their price. I would take my list of clients get quality lenses and resell every one on this only negative about the frame etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Vin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses. Amazing Price.
customer_reviews.text: I got these sunglasses for a family reunion (ordered 20). Our last name is Wood, so I thought sunglasses from "Woodies" would be a nice touch. Fantastic glasses! I love them. The kids were all excited to receive them, and the parents loved the Clubmaster throw back design. Well done Woodies!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love my Woodies. Great for the price, excellent polarization, sturdy build quality. Also have a Woodies watch and get complimented on both more than my other expensive pairs.
customer_reviews.author: BChedds

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses 🕶 are nice so far. The polarized lenses are very dark, which I like. Just wish they were a touch bigger, as that’s what I usually wear. Found some of the added items unnecessary (ie.sticker, wood guitar pick, rubber bracelet). Nicely packaged, with hard case, cloth bag, and cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke At Hinge
customer_reviews.text: The Zebra Wood Clubmaster Sunglasses are too small for an average adult size face. One will first notice sunlight enter the sides as soon as the glasses are donned. There is absolutely no further abduction in the arms once opened -- mine broke at the hinge, simply after removal from my head. Possibly these sunglasses is best suited for the face of a child?
customer_reviews.author: Markus Berg

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE them!! They are so light and fit perfect. I went back online and saw all the options, wish I had ordered more of these than the other glasses I got. Who knew there were so many types of woods. I just can't tell you how much I love them I'm a lifelong customer
customer_reviews.author: Patrice W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Want to see more.
customer_reviews.text: These are great sunglasses. They're durable, comfortable and fit well on my big head. They come with a hard core case for protection along with some other goodies. The lenses are dark. I wish they had a lighter lens option. Otherwise I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Cool glasses- would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses. I have a small face and they kind of left gouge marks on my cheeks and there’s no way they could be adjusted so I begrudgingly gave them to my little sister. They look great on her
customer_reviews.author: konyha

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I love me a good pair of sunglasses. These are my first 'retro' style pair with the semi rimmed looked. Love these things. I dig the wood on the sides, the main reason for my purchase of these. An added bonus is all the extra stuff you get with them. Will for sure be getting another pair in a different style!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: ... find sunglasses that fit my face much less look good on me and I think I finally found them
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard for me to find sunglasses that fit my face much less look good on me and I think I finally found them. I really like these glasses a lot and my favorite part is the little inscription on wood. Woodies, if y'all make some more styles for women let me know please! Thanks y'all.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The lenses are nice and dark
customer_reviews.text: They are delightful. Well made and stylish. The lenses are nice and dark. The wood is beautiful. The added goodies that came with the glasses besides the case and cloth pouch, made it fun to unpack. I can't speak enough good things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: s mcdoledole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sunglasses for the Perfect Price!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking all over for some cheap polarized sunglasses with some style. I found Woodies and I have been a happy repeat customer ever since! These sunglasses are AWESOME and some people even confuse them for Raybans! I also LOVE that they come with a sturdy case so I can take them anywhere without risk of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not good. I had a pair before and they lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: Snapped on the left side after about 3 times wearing taking on and off. The left side ear piece snapped and left a sharp splinter sticking into the side of my head. Not good. I had a pair before and they lasted for 1.5 years before the lens fell out and I lost them, but 1.5 years is great for what they cost. Hopefully this can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: these looked exactly as pictured, but they were slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: these looked exactly as pictured, but they were slightly too small for my face, and i don't have a large face or head.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality so far, dropped it a couple times and still perfect. They aren't that wide tho...
customer_reviews.author: ilan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are a little tight on my head, I am hoping that they stretch out a little bit
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Not a good find for me. Shucks.
customer_reviews.text: I require sunglasses that a) are super comfortable on my face, b) are stylish, c) are good quality and functional, and d) are affordable. These are b and d but not a and c. Sorry, they don't make the cut because the polarization is odd; i get a black diagonal line running through everything in my right line of vision and they are so dark that I can barely make out the inside of my car while driving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shades for days.
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best sunglasses! They are not only comfortable but I've gotten plenty of compliments on them. Everyone asks where I bought them. And on top of everything Woodies customer service is top notch! I'm planning on getting multiple different pairs and having shades for days..
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sunglasses. Made very well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sunglasses. Made very well, and they should last a long time if taken care of properly. Will purchase more for future.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great style and fit, not so great quality
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses fit very well, are very light and look great without being too ostentatious. The polarization is also good quality and they are not too mirror-like or dark that they impede your sight. The only issue I had: they broke while I had them on my head, walking around a store, after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: smart45556

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine and have gotten a few compliments
customer_reviews.text: My woodies arrived on time. Fit fine and have gotten a few compliments. I will hily recommend this product. Thanks for the follow up. JK
customer_reviews.author: jim krisky

customer_reviews.title: nice style
customer_reviews.text: they come in a nice box with a few gifts Nicely wrapped. But most important i like the fit
customer_reviews.author: mobile

customer_reviews.title: considering the price point (could charge 2x the price and still be a great deal). I used to work at Bausch & ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality, considering the price point (could charge 2x the price and still be a great deal). I used to work at Bausch & Lomb, when they owned RayBan - these Clubmasters are every bit as awesome as the original model, and a lot lighter on the face (nose). I'll order Woodie's Wayfarer next to compare. The optics are darker, clarity is pretty good, and scratch resistance (we'll see). Winning deal !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They handled the situation perfectly and I could not be happier. I will definitely be buying from them again
customer_reviews.text: Somehow in the transaction, my first pair arrived broken. I contacted the company immediately, and within an hour I got a response. They handled the situation perfectly and I could not be happier. I will definitely be buying from them again. These shades are fantastic, and are perfect for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOODIES replicas.
customer_reviews.text: don't Pay 14.99 EXTRA for 2 little pieces extra of wood and a NICE package!....this glasses are EXACTLY the same as the ones i paid 9.99 (the difference are the "zebra wood" ...and the package. here's the LINK :
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: They felt like they were going to snap in half just from ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small and cheap quality. They felt like they were going to snap in half just from putting them on my face. Bought these because I liked the Woodies Wayfarers so much, but returned them right away. Recommend the Wayfarers for anyone interested in Woodies products, they are beyond legit.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Upset by the bridge
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of woodies, this is the pair that depressed me. The metal part that bridges the separate lenses was uneven, very noticeably uneven. If they weren't these would by far be my favorite. They look so great, I wish it wasnt the way it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully packaged and I love the wooded sides
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the packaging and how much I got for what I paid! My boyfriend is in the military and I know these for brighten his holiday when he receives them! Beautifully packaged and I love the wooded sides!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality
customer_reviews.text: Classy, comfortable, with a clear view. Packaged wonderfully with all accessories needed included case. Looking for something different and came across Woodies, gave them a try....Love them...
customer_reviews.author: DEEWAR D

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Affordable Polarized Shades for our Crew Members
customer_reviews.text: We bought a bunch of Woodies for the crew members of our Water Shuttle Business - Hemingway Water Shuttle (shameless plug). The female crew members were quick to scoop this style up. Well made, stylish and a really good deal for polarized shades. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten tons of compliments on these! The wood is classy as well as stylish. They fit comfortably and are very durable. Lots of cool freebies too like a guitar pick, lens cloth, bracelet and case.
customer_reviews.author: Jason English

customer_reviews.title: Awsome eye protection
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my second pair of these awesome beach glasses excellent for fishing eyes feel relaxed in the ultra bright Sun.
customer_reviews.author: Boffy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a glasses freak and I must say that this is so amazing. It gives you a sophisticated look. I'm ordering another one just incase it goes out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Oluwasegun Adesiyun

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and hardly weigh anything.
customer_reviews.text: These are very attractive glasses. Lighter weight than I expected, being made out of wood. Can't wait to wear them on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are my Fav !
customer_reviews.text: Love these ! Arrived on time, came with some fancy, fun accessories including a guitar pick, cute button pin, awesome hard shell case along with a soft carrying case as well ! Will certainly buy another pair soon - with recommendations to all my family and friends !
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn L. Doran

customer_reviews.title: ... this Memorial Day Weekend at the beach and I loved them. They fit amazing and the wooden frames ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore these glasses for the first time this Memorial Day Weekend at the beach and I loved them. They fit amazing and the wooden frames are really cool and unique. Also not to mention these bad boys will only set you back $25!
customer_reviews.author: David Youngbluth

customer_reviews.title: Poor quailty
customer_reviews.text: Too small for might head - felt very poor quality. I have the WOODIES Zebra Wood Sunglasses with Purple Mirror Polarized Lens and they are much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Past Maui Jim and Ray-Ban wearer
customer_reviews.text: These are great sunglasses at a great price. They look, feel and filter great. I won't cry about losing them either.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and construction is about what you would ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and construction is about what you would expect for the price. Too small for my head though.
customer_reviews.author: Tony the Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Sick
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses, only thing there is a slight reflective glare on the inside when light hits it at certain angle. Not sure if that's just a thing with glasses since I don't normally wear them. Over all I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seem very nice. Very tight, made more for a narrow head, not a melon like mine...lol
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy these again!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for a friend. He loved them, beautifully made, plus they threw in a free wristband and guitar pick!
customer_reviews.author: California Kid

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I want inexpensive sunglasses. I sit on them, lose them etc. Tried these on a whim. They are very well made and look great. They also came with a really nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made, would not purchase or tell a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan b

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Based on price and style.....pretty cool sunglasses. They were a gift and the recipient loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but I thought they looked and felt really cheap.
customer_reviews.author: kitty_wit

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in May. Loved them at first but now it's November and the lenses are starting to peel off. It's so bad that it's hard to see out of them at all. I've never had a pair of sunglasses "go bad" in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D

customer_reviews.title: These were great for the 2 days i owned them
customer_reviews.text: These were great for the 2 days i owned them. looked amazing, just don't wear them while swimming drunk in the ocean in mexico. My glasses are somewhere in the Caribbean, but i mean id buy em again
customer_reviews.author: Boss

customer_reviews.title: it looks cool and i like how its light
customer_reviews.text: it looks cool and i like how its light. however, it was way to small to me, so i had to return it. so if you are like me, a 6'1'', 245 lb dude with a big head, you might want to reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheap and not as good as the picture. The wayfarers a better option
customer_reviews.author: kenn

customer_reviews.title: They are great looking
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my husband. They are great looking
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses. Attractive, stylish. Love the wood stems. Seem very well made. Great price. Want to trye other styles
customer_reviews.author: RD Wood

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses you will ever own!
customer_reviews.text: Bought myself another and my fiancee these. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Brian V

customer_reviews.title: Hubs looks great in his new Woodies
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the for my husband. He loves them and they look great on him.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P.

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: I look so good at these classes, I probably will buy a couple of more pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The glasses arrived broken. They appear to be of very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: FriscoSooner

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses! Just got them in the mail
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses! Just got them in the mail. Came with a bunch of cool stuff. For the price I just hope they hold up! Design is sick and they're so original. Dope glasses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They’re awesome sunglasses. My only small complaint is that one ...
customer_reviews.text: They’re awesome sunglasses. My only small complaint is that one lense is somewhat loose and doesn’t feel durable. But overall I like them and I like how they come with a sticker and wristband.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bao

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and was excited to get first pair but ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and was excited to get first pair but unfortunetly we stepped and broke them . Looking forward o ordering a new pair and taking advantage of the awesome case that comes with it !
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow face and these glasses still broke in the frame within the first 3 wears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very regular quality.
customer_reviews.text: The product is aesthetically very good ... but the quality of the plastic used leaves much to be desired. The plastic part broke on the first day of use. The glasses are small and the quality very regular
customer_reviews.author: Casalas

customer_reviews.title: really cool. Gave them to my 23-year-old son
customer_reviews.text: These are really, really cool. Gave them to my 23-year-old son. They look super smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Usually Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Really good sunglasses, I love the look. Great quality for the price! They fit is a little snug at first but after a few uses they seem really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bhairavi

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubbers
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Super light, they seem pretty durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chin

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with these is that they tend to disappear if I leave them lying around the house (not that I would accuse my adult children of stealing my “cool” sunglasses)!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Comes with case! Great deal for price!
customer_reviews.author: ja9bc

customer_reviews.title: I also like the style a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate that they are very light. Heavy glasses have a tendency to give me a headache. I also like the style a lot, I only wish the lens portion was a little smaller. I am not into the big Hollywood glasses
customer_reviews.author: mes

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as shown but died within 3 months of use. Never buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Calista Goh

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good. They look good
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t worn them yet, just tried them on, but so far so good. They look good. Good quality. Came on time. Very secure packaging and nice case to keep them safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like but a Lil small for my big head. Have others and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Kadmiel Fenton, II

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish! No probelms. Lenses are cheap and not super clear but have not popped out.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: so bad
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the worst sunglasses I've ever worn. If the goal is to block out all light except for the sun, these things are perfect. How do you make such a bad product its honestly mind boggling.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were a great purchase. It has an excellent fit, it i does its job of protecting my eyes from the sun, very well.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Railey

customer_reviews.title: Very good job, Woodies
customer_reviews.text: Very good job, Woodies. Perfect fit on my face. Great looking wood frames making contrast with the lens, which are very stylish. Cheap price for good quality. Thanks! So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Arua Caselli

customer_reviews.title: I would like to see models with straight arms for those of ...
customer_reviews.text: Dark glasses but arms could be longer. I would like to see models with straight arms for those of with big heads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool looking sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking sunglasses. Prompt delivery and the whole transaction went smoothly. Will be buying several more pairs in the future. See you at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Richard E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. Highly recommend and will not ever get any other sunglass brand!
customer_reviews.author: James Standley

customer_reviews.title: Love how they look!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Woodies. They are so fun. They arrived in a hard case with lots of little extras. I've already bought another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Thinking my brother will love them. I love the packaging
customer_reviews.text: Giving these as a gift for Christmas. Thinking my brother will love them. I love the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: heatherkay08

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look good and fit fine but are too dark, Is there anything I can do to lighten the up?
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth B

customer_reviews.title: love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: love these glasses. one of the nose peices was bent a little making the glasses uneven but not bad enough to send them back. cant wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: paula t campisi

customer_reviews.title: Great value Ray-ban style glasses!
customer_reviews.text: They look and fit great and I love the extra goodies (case, cleaning cloth, stickers, etc) that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: drewbiedew

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look great, one size are not ideal when you're a tall person
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: My son loved the sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Goodies not only look cool, but they come with a Best little case and a wooden guitar pick. Great gift👍
customer_reviews.author: kATHERINE mARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement!
customer_reviews.text: The nose piece fell off right away, Do you warrant your product?
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sunglasses at a great price. The packaging they came in was pretty rad too! Sunglass sleeve, durable case, stickers etc. I def plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn A.

customer_reviews.title: but LOVE THEM. Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Only have had them a few days... but LOVE THEM. Super cute :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shades. They look alot more expensive than they are.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Prado

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super fast and awesome. Came with a bunch of cute little extras, like a sticker and guitar pick! Will buy next pair from you guys again!
customer_reviews.author: sarah cassette

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted, and then some!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safely in its case, no scratches and lots of freebie bonus things! They look nice on me, and feel comfy. It's been cloudy here, but I can't wait to wear these on a sunny day in the city!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: it was everyone's favorite part!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for each of my groomsmen as part of their gift. Needless to say, it was everyone's favorite part!
customer_reviews.author: joshua j sweet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood grain, quality made. Shipped quickly and arrived with lots of extra swag.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of the glasses. Haven't used them much yet since it has been overcast.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Martinson
